DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety immunogenicity single subcutaneous injection TAK-850 compare intramuscular injection TAK-850 healthy Japanese adult
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1/2 Study TAK-850 Subcutaneous Injection Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: The drug test study call TAK-850 . This drug test evaluate safety immunogenicity single subcutaneous injection compare single , intramuscular injection . A total 110 healthy participant ( 55 per group ) take part study . Each participant randomly ( like flip coin ) assign receive one following : - A single injection TAK-850 , subcutaneously , - A single injection TAK-850 , intramuscularly . Participants make 3 visit study site . Total duration study 22 day .
